content.1: Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters, and he that hath no money; come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.
content.2: Wherefore do ye spend money for
content.3: Incline your ear, and come unto me: hear, and your soul shall live; and I will make an everlasting covenant with you,
content.5: Behold, thou shalt call a nation
content.7: Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the
content.10: For as the rain cometh down, and the snow from heaven, and returneth not thither, but watereth the earth, and maketh it bring forth and bud, that it may give seed to the sower, and bread to the eater:
content.11: So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper
content.12: For ye shall go out with joy, and be led forth with peace: the mountains and the hills shall break forth before you into singing, and all the trees of the field shall clap
